original_text: And the anger of the Lord was kindled against Israel, and he gave them continually into the hand of Hazael king of Syria and into the hand of Ben-hadad the son of Hazael.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘에게 노하사 늘 아람 왕 하사엘의 손과 그의 아들 벤하닷의 손에 넘기셨더니

sentences.original_text: And the anger of the Lord was kindled against Israel
and he gave them continually into the hand of Hazael king of Syria
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 계속해서 시리아 왕 하사엘의 손에 넘겨주었으며

sentences.original_text: and into the hand of Ben-hadad the son of Hazael.
